page.description: ListCNAMERecords creates a list of existing CNAME records.

argument.name: BYREF List
argument.description: A variable into which the list should be placed as a result of the function call.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .t. if the call succeeded or .f. if the function call failed. See the contents of the CallResult property for more information on the cause of the error.

page.example:
' List CNAME records.
dim cs as c ?A5DNS::Manager::ShowConnectionstringdialog(cs, cs) cs = "Provider='AmazonRoute53';Timeout='10000';AccessKey='xxxxxxxxxxxxx';SecretKey='xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx';Domain='example.com.';" dim dnsm as A5DNS::Manager = null_value() Result = A5DNS::Manager::Open(dnsm,cs) dim Records as C ?dnsm.ListCNAMERecords(Records) ?Records
